full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 126 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 (Jury not present) 2 THE COURT: Mr. Parkinson, you may exit for the lunch break. Thank you. 3 4 THE WITNESS: Thank you, your Honor. 5 (Witness temporarily excused) 6 THE COURT: Everyone may be seated. 7 8 Are there matters to take up, counsel, before the break? 9 10 MS. COMEY: Not before the break, your Honor. I think we'll confer with defense counsel with the limiting instruction, and we'll deal with the technical preparations during the lunch break, and then raise any issues with your Honor closer to the restart. 11 12 13 THE COURT: Okay, yes, you'll confer on the limiting instruction and when it will be given? 14 15 MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. 16 17 THE COURT: And let me know if you have disagreement as to any of that. And you will work out the tech. 18 19 Mr. Everdell? 20 MR. EVERDELL: I think we can confer, your Honor. 21 THE COURT: Okay. Anything to take up? 22 MR. EVERDELL: No. 23 24 THE COURT: Thank you. So we'll resume in 45. Thank you. 25 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018227

text_blocks.content: (Jury not present) THE COURT: Mr. Parkinson, you may exit for the lunch break. Thank you. THE WITNESS: Thank you, your Honor. (Witness temporarily excused) THE COURT: Everyone may be seated. Are there matters to take up, counsel, before the break? MS. COMEY: Not before the break, your Honor. I think we'll confer with defense counsel with the limiting instruction, and we'll deal with the technical preparations during the lunch break, and then raise any issues with your Honor closer to the restart. THE COURT: Okay, yes, you'll confer on the limiting instruction and when it will be given? MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: And let me know if you have disagreement as to any of that. And you will work out the tech. Mr. Everdell? MR. EVERDELL: I think we can confer, your Honor. THE COURT: Okay. Anything to take up? MR. EVERDELL: No. THE COURT: Thank you. So we'll resume in 45. Thank you. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor.
